title: Working dog health Part 1  General Health including worming and vaccinations

tasks.task: Attend a Beef and Lamb New Zealand North Canterbury Farming for Profit webinar on working dogs.
subtasks: Discuss the TeamMate program and its origins.
Explain core vaccinations for working dogs (parvovirus, Adenovirus 2, and paravirulent encephalitis).
Address vaccine schedules, including puppy vaccinations and adult booster needs.
Discuss kennel cough vaccinations and their importance.
Explain leptospirosis vaccination considerations in New Zealand.
Guide participants on proper worming schedules for puppies and adults.
Provide insights on housing and kennel management for working dogs.
Address questions from attendees regarding pit parasitology and treatment options.
